name: The Spacial Maze
description:
The purpose is to raise awareness to 4 different types of disabilities: sight, hearing, Parkinson and walking disability through a fun and challenging gaming experience.

The player will be able to choose a character with a disability and then enter a random maze and will have to find his way out with the help of tools appropriate to the type of disability chosen.

All the characters will solve the same tasks and this will demonstrate and emphasize the specific difficulty of each person with a disability, a task that will be easy for one character can be very difficult for another character.

The challenges that the player will experience will raise his awareness of the various disabilities.

Build a random maze using Recursive implementation of Randomized depth-first search Maze generation algorithm. 

The game is developed in the Unity 3D game engine The code is written in C #.
